Other options are [Chronometer](https://cronometer.com/) and [LoseIt](https://www.loseit.com/). The specific app is less important than figuring out your [TDEE or maintenance calories](https://tdeecalculator.net/), and tracking well enough to be reasonably sure you're eating less than that on average each day.
